A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I liked this movie more after it finished and I got to think about it. It didn't quite fit with the Star Wars tropes\, it thumbed its nose at heroes from royal lineage\, it had a couple of messages which were actually quite powerful "Failure is our greatest teacher' and 'we win\, not by fighting what we hate\, but saving what we love' Those two messages made sense of the whole movie. 
Some parts were overly emo\, some I think could be edited to be a bit tighter.
And some illogical shit was annoying - there's no gravity in space\, why did the bombs drop down??
But overall\, once I got over my expectations... I think it's a better movie than expected - 8/10
